courseDetails.title: Cómo Automatizar el SEO de tu Sitio Web con Slim SEO
courseDetails.shortDescription: Optimiza y automatiza el SEO de tu sitio web en WordPress con el plugin Slim SEO, de forma fácil y rápida.
courseDetails.longDescription:
¿DESEAS OPTIMIZAR Y AUTOMATIZAR EL SEO DE TU SITIO WEB DE FORMA FÁCIL Y RÁPIDA?

La optimización SEO (Search Engine Optimization) es crucial para el éxito de cualquier sitio web porque aumenta la visibilidad en los motores de búsqueda, atrae tráfico orgánico de calidad y mejora la experiencia del usuario, lo que puede traducirse en mayores oportunidades de negocio y conversiones.

Aquí te detallo la importancia:

1. Mayor visibilidad y tráfico:

  • Aumento de la visibilidad:

    El SEO ayuda a que tu sitio web aparezca en los primeros resultados de búsqueda cuando los usuarios buscan información, productos o servicios relacionados con tu negocio.

  • Atrae tráfico cualificado:

    Al optimizar para palabras clave relevantes, atraes a usuarios que realmente están interesados en lo que ofreces, aumentando la probabilidad de conversiones.

  • Tráfico orgánico:

    El SEO se enfoca en el tráfico orgánico (no pagado), lo que significa que atraes visitantes de forma continua y sostenible a través de los motores de búsqueda.

2. Mejora la experiencia del usuario:

  • Navegación más fluida:

    El SEO también implica mejorar la estructura y la navegación del sitio web, lo que facilita la búsqueda de información y mejora la experiencia general del usuario.

  • Contenido relevante:

    Al optimizar para palabras clave relevantes, también te aseguras de que el contenido de tu sitio sea valioso y responda a las necesidades de los usuarios.

  • Velocidad de carga:

    La optimización SEO también considera la velocidad de carga del sitio, un factor importante para la satisfacción del usuario y para el posicionamiento en buscadores.

3. Aumenta la credibilidad y la confianza:

  • Posicionamiento en los primeros resultados:

    Un buen posicionamiento en los motores de búsqueda genera confianza en los usuarios, ya que asocian los primeros resultados con sitios web confiables y de calidad.

  • Marca más reconocida:

    El SEO ayuda a construir la marca y a generar reconocimiento, lo que puede llevar a una mayor lealtad de los clientes y a nuevas oportunidades de negocio.

4. Ventaja competitiva:

  • Destaca frente a la competencia:

    Un sitio web bien optimizado tiene una ventaja competitiva sobre aquellos que no lo están, ya que puede atraer más tráfico y clientes potenciales.

  • Inversión a largo plazo:

    El SEO es una inversión a largo plazo que puede generar resultados sostenibles y beneficios continuos para tu negocio.

En resumen, la optimización SEO es esencial para cualquier sitio web que busque tener éxito online. Te ayuda a ser encontrado, a atraer tráfico de calidad, a mejorar la experiencia del usuario y a construir una marca sólida y confiable.


¿QUÉ ES WORDPRESS?


WordPress es un software gratuito o herramienta de gestión de contenidos, también llamado CMS (Content Management System), diseñada para crear y mantener fácilmente un Blog, un sitio Web o una Tienda Online.


WordPress es sin duda alguna, el mejor gestor de contenidos del mundo, y el más utilizado con diferencia, llegando actualmente a superar el 58% de cuota de mercado. Además es de código abierto y completamente gratuito.

Empezó en 2003 como un software para blogs, pero con el tiempo ha evolucionado como CMS completo con el que podemos hacer sitios web corporativos, tiendas online, sitios de membresía, intranets y mucho más.


¿QUÉ ES SLIM SEO?

Slim SEO es un plugin de WordPress diseñado para facilitar la optimización para motores de búsqueda (SEO) de sitios web de forma rápida y automatizada. Ofrece características como la generación automática de mapas de sitio XML, optimización de etiquetas de título y meta descripciones, y la creación de esquemas de datos estructurados (JSON-LD), todo con una interfaz de usuario sencilla e intuitiva.


Características principales de Slim SEO:

  • Automatización: Realiza tareas SEO comunes de forma automática, como la generación de mapas de sitio XML y la optimización de etiquetas meta.

  • Interfaz sencilla: Ofrece una interfaz de usuario limpia y fácil de usar, ideal para principiantes y usuarios que prefieren evitar plugins complejos.

  • Esquemas de datos estructurados: Permite crear y gestionar esquemas JSON-LD para mejorar la visibilidad en los resultados de búsqueda.

  • Integración con WooCommerce: Se integra con WooCommerce para optimizar tiendas online.

  • Soporte para múltiples idiomas: Se integra con plugins multilingües como WPML, Polylang y TranslatePress.

  • Rendimiento: Está diseñado para ser ligero y no afectar el rendimiento del sitio web.

En resumen, Slim SEO es una herramienta poderosa para mejorar el SEO de tu sitio web en WordPress, especialmente para aquellos que buscan una solución fácil de usar y con funciones automatizadas.


¿QUÉ APRENDERÁS EN NUESTRO CURSO?

  • Cómo optimizar y automatizar el SEO de tu sitio web con Slim SEO.

  • Cómo instalar Slim SEO en su versión gratuita para comenzar a optimizar el SEO de tu sitio web.

  • Cómo obtener la versión premium de Slim SEO.

  • Cómo configurar correctamente las diferentes opciones y funcionalidades que nos brinda Slim SEO.

  • Cómo optimizar el SEO On Page de las entradas y páginas de tu sitio web con las opciones de configuración que nos brinda Slim SEO.


¿POR QUÉ ACCEDER A NUESTRO CURSO?


Nuestro curso de "Cómo Automatizar el SEO de tu Sitio Web con Slim SEO", es impartido por el experto y consultor de WordPress y marketing digital: "Renato Yacolca",  creador de uno de los canales de YouTube más populares del mundo en los temas de WordPress y marketing digital: Programación Fácil, SEO y Marketing, con más de 189,000 estudiantes (Botón de Plata de YouTube).

courseDetails.title: Cómo Personalizar Productos en WooCommerce con WowAddons
courseDetails.shortDescription: Personaliza productos en WooCommerce con precios dinámicos, sin saber de pogramación.
courseDetails.longDescription:
¿DESEAS PERSONALIZAR LOS PRODUCTOS DE TU TIENDA ONLINE CON PRECIOS DINÁMICOS?

La personalización de productos con precios dinámicos en una tienda online ofrece importantes ventajas competitivas y mejora la experiencia del cliente. Permite ajustar los precios en tiempo real basándose en diversos factores como la demanda, el comportamiento del cliente y la competencia, lo que puede aumentar los ingresos y la satisfacción del cliente.


Beneficios de la personalización con precios dinámicos:

  • Mayor satisfacción del cliente:

    Al ofrecer precios que se ajustan a las necesidades individuales y preferencias del cliente, se crea una experiencia más personalizada y atractiva, lo que puede aumentar la satisfacción y la lealtad.

  • Incremento de las ventas:

    La personalización puede llevar a precios más competitivos y atractivos para el cliente, lo que puede traducirse en un aumento de las ventas y la conversión.

  • Optimización de ingresos:

    La fijación de precios dinámicos permite ajustar los precios en función de la demanda, lo que puede ayudar a maximizar los ingresos al vender productos a precios más altos cuando la demanda es alta y ofrecer descuentos cuando la demanda es baja.

  • Mejor gestión del inventario:

    Los precios dinámicos pueden ayudar a reducir el exceso de inventario al ajustar los precios para fomentar la venta de productos con baja demanda, liberando espacio para nuevos productos o reduciendo costos de almacenamiento.

  • Ventaja competitiva:

    Al ajustar los precios en tiempo real y adaptarse a las condiciones del mercado, se puede obtener una ventaja competitiva frente a la competencia, atrayendo a más clientes y aumentando la participación en el mercado.

En resumen, la combinación de personalización y precios dinámicos en una tienda online puede ser una estrategia poderosa para mejorar la experiencia del cliente, aumentar las ventas y optimizar los ingresos.


¿QUÉ ES WORDPRESS?


WordPress es un software gratuito o herramienta de gestión de contenidos, también llamado CMS (Content Management System), diseñada para crear y mantener fácilmente un Blog, un sitio Web o una Tienda Online.


WordPress es sin duda alguna, el mejor gestor de contenidos del mundo, y el más utilizado con diferencia, llegando actualmente a superar el 58% de cuota de mercado. Además es de código abierto y completamente gratuito.

Empezó en 2003 como un software para blogs, pero con el tiempo ha evolucionado como CMS completo con el que podemos hacer sitios web corporativos, tiendas online, sitios de membresía, intranets y mucho más.


¿QUÉ ES WOOCOMMERCE?

WooCommerce es un plugin (complemento) de WordPress que permite implementar una tienda online totalmente funcional en una web.

Este plugin incluye todo lo necesario para empezar a vender en línea: Las páginas de tienda, carrito, mi cuenta y finalizar compra, los métodos de pago más utilizados en el mundo (transferencia bancaria, PayPal y Stripe), un sistema para configurar diferentes tipos de impuestos y gastos de envío por zonas, etc.

Por supuesto, también permite la subida de un número ilimitado de productos para su venta, pudiendo añadir su precio, descripciones (una corta y una larga), variaciones del mismo, etc.

En definitiva, WooCommerce es una de las mejores opciones que existen para crear una tienda online.


¿QUÉ ES WOWADDONS?

WowAddons es un plugin de WordPress que permite a los usuarios agregar opciones personalizadas, como campos de texto, menús desplegables, casillas de verificación, etc., a los productos que venden en su tienda WooCommerce. Esto permite a los clientes personalizar sus compras y potencialmente aumentar el valor del pedido al cobrar extra por estas opciones.


¿QUÉ APRENDERÁS EN NUESTRO CURSO?

  • Cómo agregar opciones personalizadas a tus productos en WooCommerce con el plugin WowAddons.

  • Cómo instalar WooAddons en su versión gratuita para agregar opciones personalizadas a los productos de tu tienda online.

  • Cómo obtener la versión premium de WooAddons.

  • Cómo agregar opciones personalizadas para los productos de tu tienda online.

  • Cómo configurar la lógica condicional para las opciones personalizadas de tus productos.

  • Cómo revisar el funcionamiento de las opciones personalizadas integrada a los productos de tu tienda online.


¿POR QUÉ ACCEDER A NUESTRO CURSO?


Nuestro curso de "Cómo Personalizar Productos en WooCommerce con WowAddons", es impartido por el experto y consultor de WordPress y marketing digital: "Renato Yacolca",  creador de uno de los canales de YouTube más populares del mundo en los temas de WordPress y marketing digital: Programación Fácil, SEO y Marketing, con más de 189,000 estudiantes (Botón de Plata de YouTube).


¡ACCEDE AHORA AL CURSO!


Inscríbase ahora y empiece con su aprendizaje en nuestro curso. Hay herramientas interesantes, atractivas y nuevas que aprender con el plugin de WooCommerce y WowAddons.

courseDetails.title: Generative AI & LLMs Foundations: From Basics to Application
courseDetails.shortDescription: Master the core concepts, tools, and applications of Generative AI and Large Language Models (LLMs) in just 8 weeks
courseDetails.longDescription:
"This course contains the use of artificial intelligence in creating scripts, visuals, audio, and supporting content"


This 8-week course is a complete foundation in Generative AI and Large Language Models (LLMs), designed to help you build both conceptual understanding and practical skills. The program is structured to gradually move from the basics of generative models to advanced applications, customization, safety, and a capstone project that showcases your abilities.


The course begins with an introduction to Generative AI, where you will explore tokenization, attention mechanisms, and the transformer architecture that forms the backbone of modern LLMs. You will learn how text generation works, experiment with prompt design, and analyze the impact of model parameters like temperature and top-p on creativity and accuracy.


Building on this, the course dives into the foundations of large language models, exploring embeddings, perplexity, and context windows. You will also study core generative models such as GANs (Generative Adversarial Networks), VAEs (Variational Autoencoders), and diffusion models, gaining an intuitive understanding of how these models generate text, images, and structured data.


The practical modules allow you to apply Generative AI in practice, including summarization, creative writing, code generation, data augmentation, and image synthesis. You will use modern tools and frameworks like Hugging Face Transformers, LangChain, vector databases (FAISS, Pinecone), and deployment frameworks such as FastAPI and Hugging Face Spaces.


You will also learn fine-tuning techniques, including prompt engineering, LoRA (Low-Rank Adaptation), and domain-specific customization, so you can adapt LLMs to specialized tasks. In addition, a dedicated module on ethics, safety, and governance helps you understand and mitigate bias, hallucinations, and responsible AI risks.


The course concludes with a capstone project, where you will design, implement, and present a real-world Generative AI application, integrating the skills and frameworks covered throughout the program.


By the end, you will be equipped with hands-on experience, a portfolio-ready project, and the confidence to apply Generative AI and LLMs in business, research, and innovation.

You’ll then dive into Convolutional Neural Networks (CNNs), working with classic architectures like LeNet, VGG, and ResNet, and applying them in labs on image classification, object detection, and transfer learning.

In the second half, you’ll experiment with generative models through labs on autoencoders, VAEs, GANs, and diffusion models for creative AI applications. You’ll then apply reinforcement learning, coding Q-learning, DQNs, and policy gradient methods to train agents in environments like CartPole. Finally, you’ll tackle deployment, explainability, and ethics, with labs on Flask/FastAPI + Docker deployment, SHAP/LIME explainability, fairness metrics, and multimodal AI demos.

By the end of this specialization, you’ll not only understand advanced deep learning architectures but will have practical experience from weekly labs to confidently design, train, deploy, and evaluate modern AI systems in real-world contexts.

Course Author:

Dr. Alex Amoroso is a seasoned professional with a rich background in academia and industry, specializing in research methodologies, strategy formulation, and product development. With a Doctorate Degree from the School of Social Sciences and Politics in Lisbon, Portugal, where she was awarded distinction and honour for her exemplary research, Alex Amoroso brings a wealth of knowledge and expertise to the table.

In addition to her doctoral studies, Ms. Amoroso has served as an invited teacher, delivering courses on to wide range of students from undergraduate level to business students of professional and executives courses. Currently, at EIMT in Zurich, Switzerland, she lectures for doctoral students, offering advanced instruction in research design and methodologies, and in MTF Institute Ms. Amoroso is leading Product Development academical domain.

In synergy between academical and business experience, Ms. Amoroso achieved high results in business career, leading R&D activities, product development, strategic development, market analysis activities in wide range of companies. She implemented the best market practices in industries from Banking and Finance, to PropTech, Consulting and Research, and Innovative Startups.

Alex Amoroso's extensive scientific production includes numerous published articles in reputable journals, as well as oral presentations and posters at international conferences. Her research findings have been presented at esteemed institutions such as the School of Political and Social Sciences and the Stressed Out Conference at UCL, among others.

With a passion for interdisciplinary collaboration and a commitment to driving positive change, Alex Amoroso is dedicated to empowering learners and professionals for usage of cutting edge methodologies for achieving of excellence in global business world.


Data Quality

  • Data quality refers to the overall condition of data and its fitness for use in business operations, decision-making, and planning. High-quality data is accurate, complete, consistent, timely, and valid.

  • Why it's important: Poor data quality can lead to misguided decisions, wasted resources, missed opportunities, and even reputational damage.


Data Management

  • This encompasses the processes, technologies, and policies used to acquire, store, organize, protect, and deliver data. It's about ensuring the right data is available to the right people at the right time.

  • Why it's important: Effective data management streamlines operations, improves efficiency, and enables organizations to extract valuable insights from their data assets. Think of it as the foundation for turning data into a strategic advantage.


Data Governance

  • Data governance is the framework of policies, processes, and responsibilities that ensure data is managed properly. It defines who is accountable for data, how it should be used, and how it's protected.

  • Why it's important: Data governance ensures data integrity, compliance with regulations (like GDPR), and reduces risks associated with data breaches or misuse. It's like the guardrails that keep data safe and useful.


Why are these concepts important for companies?

In data-driven world, companies that effectively manage and govern their data have a significant competitive edge. Here's why:

  • Better Decision-Making: High-quality data leads to informed decisions, reducing the risk of costly mistakes.

  • Improved Efficiency: Streamlined data processes save time and resources.

  • Increased Revenue: Data-driven insights can identify new opportunities, improve customer targeting, and optimize pricing strategies.

  • Enhanced Compliance: Proper data governance ensures adherence to data privacy regulations, avoiding hefty fines and legal issues.

  • Stronger Reputation: Trustworthy data builds trust with customers and partners.


Why is knowledge of these concepts important for business and IT experts and managers?

Both business and IT professionals need a solid understanding of data quality, management, and governance to:

  • Bridge the Gap: IT experts understand the technical aspects of data, while business leaders grasp the strategic implications. Knowledge of these concepts allows them to collaborate effectively.

  • Drive Innovation: By understanding data's potential, they can identify new ways to leverage it for innovation and growth.

  • Champion Data Literacy: They can promote data literacy within their teams, empowering everyone to make data-informed decisions.

  • Mitigate Risks: Knowledge of data governance helps them understand and address potential risks associated with data.

  • Lead with Confidence: In a data-centric world, leaders equipped with this knowledge can confidently steer their organizations towards success.


Data quality, management, and governance are no longer just IT concerns; they are critical for every aspect of a successful business. By understanding these concepts, business and IT professionals can unlock the true value of data and drive their organizations forward.

The Data Engineer Foundations Course is a comprehensive, step-by-step program designed to help you master the core skills, tools, and concepts of modern data engineering. Whether you are a beginner entering the field or an aspiring professional enhancing your expertise, this course blends theoretical knowledge with practical application through structured hands-on labs.



You’ll start by exploring the role of a Data Engineer in today’s data-driven organizations and gain an overview of the modern data ecosystem. The course covers relational databases and NoSQL databases, guiding you on how to efficiently store and retrieve data. You will then dive into data ingestion methods and build ETL (Extract, Transform, Load) and ELT (Extract, Load, Transform) pipelines, ensuring a strong understanding of data movement across systems.



Next, you’ll explore batch processing frameworks, real-time streaming tools, and gain exposure to major cloud platforms like AWS, Azure, and Google Cloud. You’ll also learn workflow orchestration using tools such as Apache Airflow, alongside automation alternatives. To ensure reliability, the course emphasizes data quality, data governance, and data security, aligning with industry best practices.



Through guided hands-on labs, you’ll ingest, transform, and load datasets, build automated workflows, and apply security controls — working directly with real-world tools.



By the end, you’ll have the knowledge, skills, and confidence to design, build, and maintain scalable, secure, and high-quality data systems — fully prepared to launch or advance your career in data engineering.

Project Management Methodologies: Agile, Scrum, and PMP


Agile

  • Agile is a flexible, iterative approach to project management that emphasizes collaboration, customer feedback, and the ability to adapt to change.

  • It is a set of principles and values that guide how teams work together to deliver projects.

  • Agile is often used in software development, but it can be applied to any type of project.


Scrum

  • Scrum is a specific Agile framework that provides a set of rules and practices for managing projects.

  • It is based on the idea of short, iterative cycles called sprints.

  • Scrum teams are typically small, cross-functional, and self-organizing.


PMP

  • PMP stands for Project Management Professional.

  • It is a globally recognized certification that demonstrates a person's knowledge and skills in project management.


Why Implementing Project Management Methodologies Is Important for Companies

  • Improved project planning and execution

  • Increased efficiency and productivity

  • Reduced costs and risks

  • Improved communication and collaboration

  • Increased customer satisfaction

  • Better ability to adapt to change


Why Developing Project Management Skills Is Important for Your Career

  • Increased earning potential

  • Improved job prospects

  • Greater career advancement opportunities

  • Enhanced professional credibility

  • Increased ability to contribute to organizational success

  • Improved leadership and teamwork skills


In addition to the above, here are some other reasons why developing project management skills is important for your career:

  • Project management skills are in high demand.

  • Project management skills are transferable across industries.

  • Project management skills can help you to be more successful in your current role.

  • Project management skills can help you to start your own business.

Customer experience (CX) is the overall impression customers have of your brand throughout their interactions with your business. It encompasses everything from the initial marketing message to the post-purchase support they receive. Think of it as the customer journey, and CX is all the touchpoints along the way that shape their perception.


Key Areas of CX

  • Customer touchpoints: Every interaction a customer has with your brand, like websites, social media, advertising, in-store experience, and customer service.

  • Customer journey: Mapping out the steps a customer takes to interact with your brand, from awareness to purchase and beyond.

  • Customer satisfaction: How happy customers are with your product or service.

  • Customer loyalty: How likely customers are to return and recommend your brand to others.


CX Frameworks

Frameworks provide a structured approach to improving CX. Here are two common ones:

  • Customer Experience Journey Map: A visual representation of the customer journey, identifying touchpoints and opportunities for improvement.

  • Five Service Dimensions: A framework that focuses on five key aspects of service quality: reliability, responsiveness, assurance, empathy, and tangibles.


Why Learning CXM is Important for Companies:

  1. Improved Customer Satisfaction and Loyalty: CXM focuses on understanding and meeting customer needs, leading to increased satisfaction and a higher likelihood of repeat business.

  2. Enhanced Brand Reputation: Positive customer experiences contribute to a strong brand reputation, attracting new customers and retaining existing ones.

  3. Increased Revenue and Profitability: Satisfied customers are more likely to spend more, refer others, and remain loyal, all of which contribute to revenue growth.

  4. Competitive Advantage: In today's crowded marketplace, exceptional customer experience can be a key differentiator, setting a company apart from its competitors.

  5. Reduced Costs: Resolving customer issues proactively and efficiently can reduce the cost of customer service and support.


Why Learning CXM is Important for Building a Career as a Manager:

  1. In-demand Skill: CXM is a highly sought-after skill in today's business world, as companies increasingly recognize its importance.

  2. Career Advancement: Expertise in CXM can open doors to various managerial roles, such as Customer Experience Manager, Customer Success Manager, or Marketing Manager.

  3. Problem-solving Skills: CXM involves identifying and addressing customer pain points, which enhances problem-solving and analytical skills.

  4. Leadership Development: Managing customer experience initiatives requires strong leadership, communication, and collaboration skills.

  5. Cross-functional Collaboration: CXM often involves working with multiple departments, providing managers with exposure to different areas of the business.


Overall, learning CXM is crucial for companies looking to thrive in the modern business landscape. It's also a valuable investment for managers aiming to build a successful career in various industries.


Course Objectives and Structure

  • Understand the fundamentals of Customer Experience Management (CX).

  • Explore key CX principles and concepts.

  • Delve into high-level frameworks and specific strategies for enhancing customer experience.


Concept and Importance of customer experience

  • Customer Experience (CX) manages all customer interactions for positive experiences.

  • CX differentiates brands, builds loyalty, and drives growth in competitive markets.


Key Principles and Concepts of CX

  • Personalisation

  • Consistency

  • Empathy

  • Accessibility

courseDetails.title: Gestão de Empresas e Empreendedorismo
courseDetails.shortDescription: Geração de Ideias, Planeamento Empresarial, Financiar o seu Negócio, Considerações Jurídicas, Marketing e Vendas
courseDetails.longDescription:
Bem-vindo ao programa: Programa Avançado em Negócios e Empreendedorismo


Curso ministrado pelo MTF Institute of Management, Technology and Finance

O MTF é o instituto global de educação e pesquisa com sede em Lisboa, Portugal, focado em educação híbrida (presencial e online) para negócios e profissionais nas áreas: Negócios e Administração, Ciência e Tecnologia, Banca e Finanças.

O centro de P&D do MTF concentra-se em atividades de pesquisa nas áreas: Inteligência Artificial, Machine Learning, Ciência de Dados, Big Data, WEB3, Blockchain, Criptomoedas e Ativos Digitais, Metaversos, Transformação Digital, Fintech, Comércio Eletrónico, Internet das Coisas.

O MTF é parceiro oficial da: IBM, Intel, Microsoft, membro da Câmara de Comércio e Indústria Portuguesa.

O MTF está presente em 215 países e já foi escolhido por mais de 560 000 alunos.


Autor do Curso: O Dr. João Martins é um gestor e empreendedor experiente, com mais de 30 anos de experiência em cargos de alta gestão nos setores de telecomunicações e TI. Começando num ambiente académico, onde obteve o seu doutoramento em Engenharia e um MBA na Universidade Nova de Lisboa, evoluiu rapidamente para cargos de C-suite no ambiente corporativo, tanto em grandes empresas como em startups. Atualmente é administrador e acionista de uma startup integradora de TI em Lisboa, focada em cibersegurança. Apaixonado por educação, é também Professor convidado na Nova Information Management School, lecionando Gestão do Conhecimento e Análise Financeira a alunos de pós-graduação e graduação.


O curso "Introdução ao Empreendedorismo" é projetado para permitir uma compreensão básica do empreendedorismo, a sua importância na economia moderna e as skills essenciais necessárias para ter sucesso como empreendedor.

Ao longo do curso, os alunos irão explorar vários aspetos do empreendedorismo, incluindo geração de ideias, planeamento de negócios, financiamento, marketing e operações.

O curso também aprofunda as características que definem empreendedores de sucesso e as diferenças entre empreendedorismo e propriedade de pequenas empresas.

Serão utilizados estudos de caso reais para ilustrar a aplicação destes conceitos em cenários práticos.

No final do curso, os alunos terão uma compreensão abrangente do que é necessário para iniciar e crescer um negócio de sucesso e estarão equipados com o conhecimento para navegar nos desafios do empreendedorismo.


Empreendedorismo é o processo de identificar oportunidades, inovar e assumir riscos para criar e gerir um empreendimento comercial. Envolve a vontade de suportar a incerteza e a capacidade de adaptação a circunstâncias em mudança para alcançar o sucesso. Empreendedores são indivíduos que embarcam nesta jornada, utilizando a sua criatividade, visão e determinação para dar vida às suas ideias. Existem várias razões principais pelas quais os indivíduos optam por se tornar empreendedores e construir os seus próprios negócios:


Busca pela Paixão: Muitos empreendedores são movidos pela paixão por uma determinada ideia, produto ou serviço. Eles querem concretizar a sua visão e causar um impacto significativo na sua área de atuação.

  • Independência Financeira: Construir um negócio de sucesso pode proporcionar liberdade e independência financeira. Os empreendedores têm a oportunidade de criar riqueza para si e para as suas famílias, capitalizando as suas próprias ideias e trabalho árduo.

  • Flexibilidade e Autonomia: O empreendedorismo oferece a flexibilidade de definir o seu próprio horário e trabalhar em projetos que se alinhem com os seus valores e objetivos pessoais. Os empreendedores têm autonomia para tomar decisões e moldar a direção dos seus negócios como acharem melhor.

  • Desejo de Inovação: O empreendedorismo é frequentemente impulsionado pelo desejo de inovar e criar algo novo. Os empreendedores procuram resolver problemas, revolucionar indústrias e apresentar soluções inovadoras que melhorem a vida das pessoas.

  • Crescimento Pessoal e Realização: Construir um negócio pode ser uma experiência profundamente gratificante que promove o crescimento pessoal e a realização. Os empreendedores enfrentam desafios, superam obstáculos e aprendem lições valiosas ao longo do caminho, o que pode levar a uma sensação de realização e satisfação.


Aprender sobre negócios pode fornecer conhecimentos e habilidades essenciais que apoiam o processo de construção de uma carreira e lançamento de uma startup. Algumas maneiras pelas quais aprender sobre negócios pode ser benéfico incluem:


Compreender a Dinâmica do Mercado: Uma sólida compreensão dos princípios de negócios pode ajudar os empreendedores a identificar oportunidades de mercado, avaliar a procura pelos seus produtos ou serviços e desenvolver estratégias eficazes para alcançar o seu público-alvo.

Gestão Financeira: Aprender sobre finanças e contabilidade é crucial para gerir os aspetos financeiros de um negócio, incluindo orçamento, previsão e gestão de fluxo de caixa. Esse conhecimento é essencial para tomar decisões informadas e garantir a saúde financeira de uma startup.

Marketing e Vendas: Estratégias eficazes de marketing e vendas são essenciais para atrair clientes e fazer crescer um negócio. Aprender sobre princípios de marketing, branding e aquisição de clientes pode ajudar os empreendedores a desenvolver estratégias para promover eficazmente os seus produtos ou serviços e impulsionar as vendas.

Liderança e Gestão: Aprender sobre os princípios de liderança e gestão pode ajudar os empreendedores a construir e liderar equipas de alto desempenho, delegar tarefas de forma eficaz e criar uma cultura de trabalho positiva dentro das suas organizações. No geral, aprender sobre negócios pode fornecer aos empreendedores o conhecimento, as habilidades e a confiança de que precisam para navegar pelos desafios do empreendedorismo, construir negócios de sucesso e atingir os seus objetivos.
targetAudiences: Sem requisitos especiais. Um curso para qualquer pessoa que queira construir uma carreira em Gestão

O curso "Introdução ao Empreendedorismo" é projetado para permitir uma compreensão básica do empreendedorismo, a sua importância na economia moderna e as skills essenciais necessárias para ter sucesso como empreendedor.   Ao longo do curso, os alunos irão explorar vários aspetos do empreendedorismo, incluindo geração de ideias, planeamento de negócios, financiamento, marketing e operações.   O curso também aprofunda as características que definem empreendedores de sucesso e as diferenças entre empreendedorismo e propriedade de pequenas empresas.   Serão utilizados estudos de caso reais para ilustrar a aplicação destes conceitos em cenários práticos.   No final do curso, os alunos terão uma compreensão abrangente do que é necessário para iniciar e crescer um negócio de sucesso e estarão equipados com o conhecimento para navegar nos desafios do empreendedorismo.

Empreendedorismo é o processo de identificar oportunidades, inovar e assumir riscos para criar e gerir um empreendimento comercial. Envolve a vontade de suportar a incerteza e a capacidade de adaptação a circunstâncias em mudança para alcançar o sucesso. Empreendedores são indivíduos que embarcam nesta jornada, utilizando a sua criatividade, visão e determinação para dar vida às suas ideias. Existem várias razões principais pelas quais os indivíduos optam por se tornar empreendedores e construir os seus próprios negócios:

Busca pela Paixão: Muitos empreendedores são movidos pela paixão por uma determinada ideia, produto ou serviço. Eles querem concretizar a sua visão e causar um impacto significativo na sua área de atuação.  Independência Financeira: Construir um negócio de sucesso pode proporcionar liberdade e independência financeira. Os empreendedores têm a oportunidade de criar riqueza para si e para as suas famílias, capitalizando as suas próprias ideias e trabalho árduo.  Flexibilidade e Autonomia: O empreendedorismo oferece a flexibilidade de definir o seu próprio horário e trabalhar em projetos que se alinhem com os seus valores e objetivos pessoais. Os empreendedores têm autonomia para tomar decisões e moldar a direção dos seus negócios como acharem melhor.  Desejo de Inovação: O empreendedorismo é frequentemente impulsionado pelo desejo de inovar e criar algo novo. Os empreendedores procuram resolver problemas, revolucionar indústrias e apresentar soluções inovadoras que melhorem a vida das pessoas.  Crescimento Pessoal e Realização: Construir um negócio pode ser uma experiência profundamente gratificante que promove o crescimento pessoal e a realização. Os empreendedores enfrentam desafios, superam obstáculos e aprendem lições valiosas ao longo do caminho, o que pode levar a uma sensação de realização e satisfação.

Aprender sobre negócios pode fornecer conhecimentos e habilidades essenciais que apoiam o processo de construção de uma carreira e lançamento de uma startup. Algumas maneiras pelas quais aprender sobre negócios pode ser benéfico incluem:  Compreender a Dinâmica do Mercado: Uma sólida compreensão dos princípios de negócios pode ajudar os empreendedores a identificar oportunidades de mercado, avaliar a procura pelos seus produtos ou serviços e desenvolver estratégias eficazes para alcançar o seu público-alvo.  Gestão Financeira: Aprender sobre finanças e contabilidade é crucial para gerir os aspetos financeiros de um negócio, incluindo orçamento, previsão e gestão de fluxo de caixa. Esse conhecimento é essencial para tomar decisões informadas e garantir a saúde financeira de uma startup.  Marketing e Vendas: Estratégias eficazes de marketing e vendas são essenciais para atrair clientes e fazer crescer um negócio. Aprender sobre princípios de marketing, branding e aquisição de clientes pode ajudar os empreendedores a desenvolver estratégias para promover eficazmente os seus produtos ou serviços e impulsionar as vendas.  Liderança e Gestão: Aprender sobre os princípios de liderança e gestão pode ajudar os empreendedores a construir e liderar equipas de alto desempenho, delegar tarefas de forma eficaz e criar uma cultura de trabalho positiva dentro das suas organizações. No geral, aprender sobre negócios pode fornecer aos empreendedores o conhecimento, as habilidades e a confiança de que precisam para navegar pelos desafios do empreendedorismo, construir negócios de sucesso e atingir os seus objetivos.

Learn how to apply these techniques to your own writing, making your stories resonate on a deeper emotional level.

.

~ **Feature Presentation:**

"illusion" (a short text movie)

Prepare for a unique cinematic experience within the course—a silent movie that takes you on a psychological journey like no other. In this gripping story, a young boy engages with a stranger on a random chat site, spinning a tale so convincing that it blurs the line between reality and illusion.


  The boy weaves an intricate narrative, claiming that the world around him is nothing but a dead planet, populated by figments of his imagination. Through a series of text-based exchanges, he draws the stranger deeper into his web of deception. Every word, every sentence, is carefully crafted to manipulate and persuade. As the stranger becomes convinced by his eight-year-long story, the boy suddenly reveals the truth: it was all a deception, a game he played to prove that even the most skeptical can be deceived by the power of words.

courseDetails.title: AI in the Workplace: Legal & Ethical Use
courseDetails.shortDescription: Learn the basics of legal and ethical use of artificial intelligence (AI) in a workplace environment
courseDetails.longDescription:
Over this course, you will learn the basics of legal and ethical use of artificial intelligence (AI) in a workplace setting as well as how to create policies to ensure responsible usage of AI and protect your organisation from any unnecessary risks.


Some of the topics covered in this course are as follows:


* An explanation into the basics of artificial intelligence (AI) and what exactly it is, including some of the basic concepts

* Types of AI that you might find in use in a workplace (Automation, Analytics, Generative AI and decision support)

* Laws and regulations surrounding AI (for example, this would be GDPR within the European Union (EU)

* Ethical principles of AI in business (for example, fairness and bias mitigation, along with transparency and explainability)

* Practical applications of AI and the associated risks involved when building and or purchasing them


Although artificial intelligence is a fairly new technology, it is becoming more advanced as time goes on, meaning that knowledge of all of the above will become more important than ever. As AI is an evolving field, it is my intention to update this course on a regular basis, to ensure that the knowledge within it remains useful and up-to-date.
targetAudiences: Anyone wanting to learn the basics of artificial intelligence use in an organisation

courseDetails.longDescription:
Welcome to Program: Advanced Certificate in Program and Project Management by MTF Institute


Course provided by MTF Institute of Management, Technology and Finance

MTF is the global educational and research institute with HQ at Lisbon, Portugal, focused on business & professional hybrid (on-campus and online) education at areas: Business & Administration, Science & Technology, Banking & Finance.

MTF R&D center focused on research activities at areas: Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, Data Science, Big Data, WEB3, Blockchain, Cryptocurrency & Digital Assets, Metaverses, Digital Transformation, Fintech, Electronic Commerce, Internet of Things.

MTF is the official partner of: IBM, Intel, Microsoft, member of the Portuguese Chamber of Commerce and Industry.

MTF is present in 215 countries and has been chosen by more than 620 000 students.


Author of the course:

Ana Cristina M. B. Saraiva is a distinguished professional with a robust blend of academic and industry experience, specializing in management, strategic development, and ethical leadership. She earned her Ph.D. in Management from Lusíada University, where she excelled in research management, critical analysis of management models, and advanced research methodologies, earning recognition for her contributions to the field.

She currently serves as a Project Manager at the Portuguese Association of Business Ethics (APEE). Her role underscores her commitment to driving ethical innovation and sustainability in both public and private sectors.

In academia, she has made significant contributions as a consultant and researcher at Lusíada University’s COMEGI research center. She has collaborated with esteemed national and international institutions, including IST (Lisbon University) and various European universities, to advance research and implement cutting-edge solutions in management and organizational practices. Her editorial expertise includes managing and indexing scientific journals in Scopus, DOAJ, and other prestigious platforms, reflecting her dedication to high standards in academic publishing.

Her industry experience spans over a decade, including pivotal roles in luxury hospitality, where she led efforts in event coordination, quality assurance, and guest satisfaction. She has a proven track record of enhancing operational excellence and strategic management, making her a versatile leader capable of driving results in diverse settings.

Ana Saraiva’s extensive scholarly output includes numerous peer-reviewed articles and conference presentations that address critical issues in management, ethics, and digital transformation. She is adept in a wide range of digital tools and platforms, such as SPSS, SAS, and NVivo, which she leverages to optimize research and business outcomes.

With a passion for interdisciplinary collaboration and a commitment to ethical and sustainable practices, Ana Cristina M. B. Saraiva is dedicated to empowering organizations and individuals to achieve excellence through innovative solutions and responsible leadership in the global business landscape.


Introduction to the Program Management Module

The module introduces program management, highlighting its strategic role in managing related projects to achieve broader organizational goals. The session is divided into four stages:


  1. What is Program Management

  2. The Role of a Program Manager

  3. Understanding Projects – key stages, artifacts, documents, meetings, and activities.

  4. Program Management Methodologies – including benefits and challenges.


Key Concepts and Insights

What is Program Management?

  • Definition: Coordinated management of related projects for strategic alignment and value delivery.

  • Focuses on improving organizational performance, managing interdependencies, and delivering consolidated benefits.


The Role of a Program Manager

  • Operates at a strategic level to align projects with organizational objectives.

  • Distinct from a project manager, focusing on coordination, strategic outcomes, and long-term benefits.

  • Responsibilities include program planning, resource allocation, governance, and change management.


Strategic Program Alignment

  • Ensures programs contribute to organizational strategy through proper planning and alignment.

  • Involves stakeholder engagement, governance, and risk management.


Program Lifecycle Management

  • Phases include:

    • Initiation: Defining vision, stakeholders, and initial planning.

    • Planning: Roadmaps, risk assessment, and governance.

    • Execution & Monitoring: Tracking progress and benefits realization.

    • Closure: Consolidating outcomes and transitioning deliverables to operations.


Benefits Management

  • Focus on achieving long-term value through effective tracking, analysis, and transitioning deliverables into operations.


Stakeholder Engagement

  • Active management of relationships and communication to align stakeholder needs with program objectives.

  • Tools include communication plans and risk identification strategies.


Governance

  • Establishes a framework to ensure programs align with organizational policies and maintain transparency.


Key Takeaways

  • Program management delivers strategic benefits beyond individual projects.

  • Involves a lifecycle approach from initiation to closure, with a focus on long-term outcomes.

  • Core skills include strategic thinking, leadership, risk management, and stakeholder alignment.


Summary of the Program Management Module Detailed

This course is divided into 4 stages. The first one is “what is Program Management”, the second one is the role of a program manager, the third stage is “Understanding Programs: Key Stages, Artifacts, Documents, Meetings, and Activities”, and the last one focus on the methodologies, benefits and challenges.


This lesson is structured in eight stages, each diving into key aspects of program management:


Introduction to Program Management: We’ll start by understanding what program management is, its importance, and how it differs from project management. This includes exploring the definition, key objectives and expected outcomes, along with its history and evolution.


Then, we will have the Key Functions and Responsibilities as a Program Manager: This section will examine the strategic role of a program manager, their essential competencies and critical responsibilities, such as strategic planning, stakeholder management, risk, and quality governance.


The Program Management Lifecycle: Here, we’ll cover the program management stages, from initiation to closure, along with important artifacts and documents like the program charter, benefits realization plan, and risk register.


Key Functions in Program Management: This part will emphasize strategic alignment, benefits management, resource allocation, and financial oversight, focusing on metrics that track program performance and impact.


Methodologies and Frameworks in Program Management: We’ll dive into common frameworks such as Managing Successful Programmes (MSP), Scaled Agile Framework (SAFe), and hybrid models, along with essential tools for program oversight.


Challenges in Program Management: In this section, we’ll discuss challenges like cross-project dependencies, stakeholder expectations, scope creep, and solutions for communication breakdowns and resource constraints.


Advanced Program Management Techniques: This includes leadership approaches, adaptive communication, and ethical decision-making, along with case studies that highlight best practices in successful programs.


Program Management Benefits, Metrics, and Evaluation: We’ll conclude by discussing metrics for assessing program impact, long-term benefits realization, and continuous improvement for future programs.


Throughout these lessons, you will gain insights into the comprehensive scope of program management, its methodologies, and the skills required to ensure successful program outcomes.


This structure will reinforce the strategic importance of program management in achieving organizational goals.


What is Project Management?

Project management is the organized application of knowledge, processes, skills, and tools to guide a project from its beginning to its successful completion. It involves:

  • Defining goals: Deciding what the project should achieve.

  • Planning: Mapping out the steps and resources needed.

  • Executing: Putting the plan into action, directing the team, and managing resources.

  • Monitoring and controlling: Tracking progress, managing changes, and addressing issues.

  • Closing: Reviewing the project, documenting results, and learning from the experience.


What is Business Project Management?

Business project management refers to applying project management principles within a business setting. These projects focus on achieving business objectives such as:

  • Launching new products or services

  • Improving or automating business processes

  • Restructuring departments

  • Implementing new software systems


The Role of Project Management

Project management plays a critical role in businesses because it:

  • Increases Efficiency: A well-defined project plan helps streamline work and avoid wasted effort.

  • Ensures Results: Project management keeps the focus on meeting defined goals within time and budget restrictions.

  • Manages Risk: Potential problems are anticipated and mitigated through careful planning and monitoring.

  • Improves Communication: Clear communication channels among team members, stakeholders, and clients help avoid misunderstandings.

  • Improves Client Satisfaction: Successful project completion within agreed-upon parameters builds trust with clients.


Why is Learning Project Management Important for Companies?

Companies invest in their employees' project management training because:

Competitive Advantage: Companies with strong project management capabilities deliver projects more successfully, gain a reputation for reliability, and outperform competitors.

Reduces Costs: Inefficient projects cost more due to delays and wasted resources. Project management helps optimize resources.

Enhances Employee Morale: Well-run projects minimize stress, improve team collaboration, and create a sense of accomplishment.

Improves Innovation: Structured project management allows for managing innovation projects, leading to a culture of innovation within the company.


How Project Management Skills Boost Your Career

Developing your project management skills can significantly enhance your career prospects:

High Demand: Project managers are in demand across industries like IT, construction, healthcare, etc.

Better Salary: Skilled project managers often earn higher salaries due to their expertise.

Leadership Potential: Project management provides a solid foundation for taking on leadership roles within organizations.

Versatility: Project management skills apply to a wide range of jobs and roles, not just project management positions.

Personal Growth: You'll build organizational, problem-solving, and communication skills, making you an asset to any team
targetAudiences: No special requirements. A course for anyone who wants to build career in Project Management

Then, we will have the Key Functions and Responsibilities as a Program Manager: This section will examine the strategic role of a program manager, their essential competencies and critical responsibilities, such as strategic planning, stakeholder management, risk, and quality governance.  The Program Management Lifecycle: Here, we’ll cover the program management stages, from initiation to closure, along with important artifacts and documents like the program charter, benefits realization plan, and risk register.  Key Functions in Program Management: This part will emphasize strategic alignment, benefits management, resource allocation, and financial oversight, focusing on metrics that track program performance and impact.  Methodologies and Frameworks in Program Management: We’ll dive into common frameworks such as Managing Successful Programmes (MSP), Scaled Agile Framework (SAFe), and hybrid models, along with essential tools for program oversight.  Challenges in Program Management: In this section, we’ll discuss challenges like cross-project dependencies, stakeholder expectations, scope creep, and solutions for communication breakdowns and resource constraints.  Advanced Program Management Techniques: This includes leadership approaches, adaptive communication, and ethical decision-making, along with case studies that highlight best practices in successful programs.  Program Management Benefits, Metrics, and Evaluation: We’ll conclude by discussing metrics for assessing program impact, long-term benefits realization, and continuous improvement for future programs.  Throughout these lessons, you will gain insights into the comprehensive scope of program management, its methodologies, and the skills required to ensure successful program outcomes.  This structure will reinforce the strategic importance of program management in achieving organizational goals.

What is Project Management?  Project management is the organized application of knowledge, processes, skills, and tools to guide a project from its beginning to its successful completion. It involves:  Defining goals: Deciding what the project should achieve.  Planning: Mapping out the steps and resources needed.  Executing: Putting the plan into action, directing the team, and managing resources.  Monitoring and controlling: Tracking progress, managing changes, and addressing issues.  Closing: Reviewing the project, documenting results, and learning from the experience.  What is Business Project Management?  Business project management refers to applying project management principles within a business setting. These projects focus on achieving business objectives such as:  Launching new products or services  Improving or automating business processes  Restructuring departments  Implementing new software systems

The Role of Project Management  Project management plays a critical role in businesses because it:  Increases Efficiency: A well-defined project plan helps streamline work and avoid wasted effort.  Ensures Results: Project management keeps the focus on meeting defined goals within time and budget restrictions.  Manages Risk: Potential problems are anticipated and mitigated through careful planning and monitoring.  Improves Communication: Clear communication channels among team members, stakeholders, and clients help avoid misunderstandings.  Improves Client Satisfaction: Successful project completion within agreed-upon parameters builds trust with clients.  Why is Learning Project Management Important for Companies?  Companies invest in their employees' project management training because:  Competitive Advantage: Companies with strong project management capabilities deliver projects more successfully, gain a reputation for reliability, and outperform competitors.  Reduces Costs: Inefficient projects cost more due to delays and wasted resources. Project management helps optimize resources.  Enhances Employee Morale: Well-run projects minimize stress, improve team collaboration, and create a sense of accomplishment.  Improves Innovation: Structured project management allows for managing innovation projects, leading to a culture of innovation within the company.

How Project Management Skills Boost Your Career  Developing your project management skills can significantly enhance your career prospects:  High Demand: Project managers are in demand across industries like IT, construction, healthcare, etc.  Better Salary: Skilled project managers often earn higher salaries due to their expertise.  Leadership Potential: Project management provides a solid foundation for taking on leadership roles within organizations.  Versatility: Project management skills apply to a wide range of jobs and roles, not just project management positions.  Personal Growth: You'll build organizational, problem-solving, and communication skills, making you an asset to any team

Financial Services – Overview of Central Banks


Central Banks play a critical role in the global economy, impacting everything from inflation, interest rates, financial stability, consumer protection and currency value.


If you’ve ever wondered how money supply is controlled, why interest rates rise and fall, or how financial crises are managed, then this course is for you.


This course: Financial Services – Overview of Central Banks provides a comprehensive introduction to the function, structure, and significance of central banks worldwide, with illustrative examples in various parts of the world.

Whether you’re an aspiring finance professional, an entrepreneur, or simply someone who wants to understand the financial world better, this course will give you the foundational knowledge and concepts you need.


By enrolling, you will:

  • Gain insight into how central banks regulate economies.

  • Understand key monetary policies and their effects on businesses and consumers.

  • Learn how interest rates, inflation, financial services regulation and currency values are managed.


No prior knowledge of finance is needed—just a curiosity about the financial system that shapes our daily lives.


With real-world examples, this course will empower you with practical knowledge that can help in career growth or decision-making.


Enrol today and start your journey toward mastering the fundamentals of central banking!



Please, feel free to reach out to me via the various ways contained in my profile.


Best regards,

Baba Oyewole FCCA

With a Doctorate Degree from the School of Social Sciences and Politics in Lisbon, Portugal, where she was awarded distinction and honour for her exemplary research, Alex Amoroso brings a wealth of knowledge and expertise to the table.

In addition to her doctoral studies, Ms. Amoroso has served as an invited teacher, delivering courses on to wide range of students from undergraduate level to business students of professional and executives courses. Currently, at EIMT in Zurich, Switzerland, she lectures for doctoral students, offering advanced instruction in research design and methodologies, and in MTF Institute Ms. Amoroso is leading Product Development academical domain.

In synergy between academical and business experience, Ms. Amoroso achieved high results in business career, leading R&D activities, product development, strategic development, market analysis activities in wide range of companies. She implemented the best market practices in industries from Banking and Finance, to PropTech, Consulting and Research, and Innovative Startups.

Alex Amoroso's extensive scientific production includes numerous published articles in reputable journals, as well as oral presentations and posters at international conferences. Her research findings have been presented at esteemed institutions such as the School of Political and Social Sciences and the Stressed Out Conference at UCL, among others.

With a passion for interdisciplinary collaboration and a commitment to driving positive change, Alex Amoroso is dedicated to empowering learners and professionals for usage of cutting edge methodologies for achieving of excellence in global business world.


Course overview

● Introduction to SQL and SQLite

● Basic SQL Commands – The Foundation

● Retrieving and Manipulating Data

● Advanced Queries and Data Aggregation

● Working with Joins

● Subqueries and Nested Queries

● Modifying Data in SQL

● Optimizing and Indexing Your Queries

● Advanced SQL Features


What is SQL

● SQL stands for Structured Query Language

● It’s a domain-specific language for managing relational databases

● SQL is used to:

○ Create and modify databases

○ Query data

○ Insert, update, and delete records

● Examples of databases: MySQL, PostgreSQL, Oracle, SQLite

● SQL is universal across relational database systems


Why SQL is Important for Business

● Marketing: SQL helps analyse customer behaviours and optimise campaigns.

● Finance: SQL is essential for tracking financial transactions and generating reports.

● Data Analytics: Extracts valuable business insights from large datasets.

● Operations: SQL can help streamline and automate workflows.

● Data-driven Decision Making: Businesses can make more informed decisions by analysing their data with SQL.


What is SQLite

● SQLite is a self-contained, serverless SQL database engine

● Open-source and free to use

● Designed for embedded database applications

● Easy to install and use

● Ideal for development, testing, and small-scale applications

● SQLite works on multiple platforms: Windows, Mac, Linux, and mobile devices

MTF R&D center focused on research activities at areas: Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, Data Science, Big Data, WEB3, Blockchain, Cryptocurrency & Digital Assets, Metaverses, Digital Transformation, Fintech, Electronic Commerce, Internet of Things.

Author of the course:

Ana Cristina M. B. Saraiva is a distinguished professional with a robust blend of academic and industry experience, specializing in management, strategic development, and ethical leadership. She earned her Ph.D. in Management from Lusíada University, where she excelled in research management, critical analysis of management models, and advanced research methodologies, earning recognition for her contributions to the field.

She currently serves as a Project Manager at the Portuguese Association of Business Ethics (APEE). Her role underscores her commitment to driving ethical innovation and sustainability in both public and private sectors.

In academia, she has made significant contributions as a consultant and researcher at Lusíada University’s COMEGI research center. She has collaborated with esteemed national and international institutions, including IST (Lisbon University) and various European universities, to advance research and implement cutting-edge solutions in management and organizational practices. Her editorial expertise includes managing and indexing scientific journals in Scopus, DOAJ, and other prestigious platforms, reflecting her dedication to high standards in academic publishing.

Her industry experience spans over a decade, including pivotal roles in luxury hospitality, where she led efforts in event coordination, quality assurance, and guest satisfaction. She has a proven track record of enhancing operational excellence and strategic management, making her a versatile leader capable of driving results in diverse settings.

Ana Saraiva’s extensive scholarly output includes numerous peer-reviewed articles and conference presentations that address critical issues in management, ethics, and digital transformation. She is adept in a wide range of digital tools and platforms, such as SPSS, SAS, and NVivo, which she leverages to optimize research and business outcomes.

With a passion for interdisciplinary collaboration and a commitment to ethical and sustainable practices, Ana Cristina M. B. Saraiva is dedicated to empowering organizations and individuals to achieve excellence through innovative solutions and responsible leadership in the global business landscape.


Introduction to the Program Management Program

The course introduces program management, highlighting its strategic role in managing related projects to achieve broader organizational goals. The session is divided into four stages:


  1. What is Program Management

  2. The Role of a Program Manager

  3. Understanding Projects – key stages, artifacts, documents, meetings, and activities.

  4. Program Management Methodologies – including benefits and challenges.


Key Concepts and Insights

What is Program Management?

  • Definition: Coordinated management of related projects for strategic alignment and value delivery.

  • Focuses on improving organizational performance, managing interdependencies, and delivering consolidated benefits.


The Role of a Program Manager

  • Operates at a strategic level to align projects with organizational objectives.

  • Distinct from a project manager, focusing on coordination, strategic outcomes, and long-term benefits.

  • Responsibilities include program planning, resource allocation, governance, and change management.


Strategic Program Alignment

  • Ensures programs contribute to organizational strategy through proper planning and alignment.

  • Involves stakeholder engagement, governance, and risk management.


Program Lifecycle Management

  • Phases include:

    • Initiation: Defining vision, stakeholders, and initial planning.

    • Planning: Roadmaps, risk assessment, and governance.

    • Execution & Monitoring: Tracking progress and benefits realization.

    • Closure: Consolidating outcomes and transitioning deliverables to operations.


Benefits Management

  • Focus on achieving long-term value through effective tracking, analysis, and transitioning deliverables into operations.


Stakeholder Engagement

  • Active management of relationships and communication to align stakeholder needs with program objectives.

  • Tools include communication plans and risk identification strategies.


Governance

  • Establishes a framework to ensure programs align with organizational policies and maintain transparency.


Key Takeaways

  • Program management delivers strategic benefits beyond individual projects.

  • Involves a lifecycle approach from initiation to closure, with a focus on long-term outcomes.

  • Core skills include strategic thinking, leadership, risk management, and stakeholder alignment.


Summary of the Program Management Course Detailed

This course is divided into 4 stages. The first one is “what is Program Management”, the second one is the role of a program manager, the third stage is “Understanding Programs: Key Stages, Artifacts, Documents, Meetings, and Activities”, and the last one focus on the methodologies, benefits and challenges.


This lesson is structured in eight stages, each diving into key aspects of program management:


Introduction to Program Management: We’ll start by understanding what program management is, its importance, and how it differs from project management. This includes exploring the definition, key objectives and expected outcomes, along with its history and evolution.


Then, we will have the Key Functions and Responsibilities as a Program Manager: This section will examine the strategic role of a program manager, their essential competencies and critical responsibilities, such as strategic planning, stakeholder management, risk, and quality governance.


The Program Management Lifecycle: Here, we’ll cover the program management stages, from initiation to closure, along with important artifacts and documents like the program charter, benefits realization plan, and risk register.


Key Functions in Program Management: This part will emphasize strategic alignment, benefits management, resource allocation, and financial oversight, focusing on metrics that track program performance and impact.


Methodologies and Frameworks in Program Management: We’ll dive into common frameworks such as Managing Successful Programmes (MSP), Scaled Agile Framework (SAFe), and hybrid models, along with essential tools for program oversight.


Challenges in Program Management: In this section, we’ll discuss challenges like cross-project dependencies, stakeholder expectations, scope creep, and solutions for communication breakdowns and resource constraints.


Advanced Program Management Techniques: This includes leadership approaches, adaptive communication, and ethical decision-making, along with case studies that highlight best practices in successful programs.


Program Management Benefits, Metrics, and Evaluation: We’ll conclude by discussing metrics for assessing program impact, long-term benefits realization, and continuous improvement for future programs.


Throughout these lessons, you will gain insights into the comprehensive scope of program management, its methodologies, and the skills required to ensure successful program outcomes.


This structure will reinforce the strategic importance of program management in achieving organizational goals.

courseDetails.title: Elite Chess Tactics & Chess Strategies from 2700+ Elo
courseDetails.shortDescription: Discover how a 2700+ ELO Grandmaster turns complex positions into wins with precise tactics and psychological tricks
courseDetails.longDescription:
This course exists—to show you, move by move, how a 2700+ ELO Grandmaster systematically defeats top-level opponents and turns complex positions into victories.

This 7.5-hour course, broken into 40+ in-depth lessons, is not based on famous games from history, but on real, high-stakes battles that I personally played and won against Grandmasters rated 2500+ ELO. Every game is analyzed from start to finish, showing you exactly how to gain the advantage in the opening, dominate in the middlegame, and convert wins in the endgame.

What You’ll Learn (and Why It Gives You an Unfair Advantage)

  • Chess Openings That Win Games – Stop playing passive setups and start using opening strategies that put immediate pressure on your opponent.

  • Middlegame Mastery – Learn how to create strong positional play, set traps, and dictate the pace of the game against even the toughest opponents.

  • Grandmaster-Level Endgames – Most players fail in the endgame. You’ll learn how to convert small advantages into unstoppable victories.

  • Tactical Precision & Killer Instinct – Recognize winning tactics before your opponent sees them, calculate deep, and execute with confidence.

  • Strategic Thinking & Game Theory – Go beyond basic principles and understand the real reasons behind every Grandmaster move.

  • Pattern Recognition & Faster Decision-Making – Learn how top players instantly spot key ideas and make strong moves under time pressure.

  • Psychological Warfare in Chess – Make your opponents uncomfortable, force them into mistakes, and take control of the game on a mental level.

Why Most Players Stay Stuck—And How You Can Break Free

The reason most players struggle to improve is not because they lack talent. It’s because they study chess the wrong way—watching random games, memorizing moves without understanding them, and hoping to "just get better" over time.

That doesn’t work.

The players who actually improve are the ones who learn from real high-level games, break down each move, and train their minds to think like a Grandmaster. That’s exactly what this course does.

What Makes This Course Different?

  • Real Grandmaster Games, Not Theoretical Concepts – You’ll see actual, hard-fought games where I beat top players, not just abstract ideas.

  • Move-by-Move Explanations – Every single move is broken down so you understand why it was played and how to apply the same ideas in your own games.

  • Practical Strategies That Work at Any Level – Whether you're an intermediate or advanced player, these ideas will immediately strengthen your game.

  • A Complete Chess Training System – Openings, middlegame play, and endgames—every phase is covered in-depth.

Here’s the Truth: If You Don’t Learn These Strategies, Your Opponents Will

Every serious chess player is looking for an edge. The ones who train with Grandmaster-level ideas gain an advantage—while those who don’t fall behind and keep losing games they should have won.

Right now, someone else is learning these strategies. The next time you face them, will you be ready?

Make the right choice. Start training like a Grandmaster today.
targetAudiences: Aspiring Chess Players: Whether you're just starting or have some experience, this course is designed for anyone eager to improve their chess skills and understanding of the game.

Anyone Who Loves Chess: Whether you play for fun or want to become a master, this course will equip you with valuable tips and skills that will elevate your chess game. From basic strategies to advanced tactics, you'll gain tips for improving your chess understanding and increasing your confidence at the board

Casual and Competitive Players Alike: Whether you're a casual player looking to sharpen your skills or a competitor aiming for higher rankings, you'll find valuable content tailored to your level.

Chess Aficionados of All Levels: This course is ideal for anyone who loves chess, regardless of their current skill level. Whether you're a beginner, intermediate, or advanced player, you'll find valuable content tailored to help you improve.

Players Seeking Improvement: If you’re looking to enhance your game with practical tips and proven strategies, this course will guide you through the essential concepts and tactics to elevate your skills.
Competitive Spirits: If you thrive on competition and want to gain an edge over your opponents, this course provides advanced techniques and insights to help you succeed on the board.
Players serious about improving and breaking through their rating plateau.
Competitors who want to increase their ELO rating and play at a higher level.
For anyone who want a deeper understanding of advanced strategies and tactical play.
Anyone tired of generic advice and looking for a real, structured path to chess mastery.

courseDetails.title: Cómo Crear una Tienda online con WordPress y Cloudways 2025
courseDetails.shortDescription: Crea una tienda online con WordPress y Cloudways, el mejor alojamiento en la nube administrado para WordPress.
courseDetails.longDescription:
¿DESEAS CREAR UNA TIENDA ONLINE CON WORPDRESS Y CLOUDWAYS?


Una tienda virtual o tienda online es un sitio web diseñado especialmente para vender productos u ofrecer servicios mediante el comercio electrónico.

Te mencionaré algunas de las ventajas que te proporcionará tener una tienda online en comparación con una tienda física:

  • Abierto al público las 24 horas.

  • No posee limitaciones geográficas.

  • Te hará aumentar los clientes.

  • Gestión sencilla y rápida.

  • Reduce gastos.

  • Permite estudiar a tus clientes.

  • Aumenta la visibilidad de tu negocio.

  • Creas una comunidad.


¿QUÉ ES CLOUDWAYS?


Cloudways es una plataforma de alojamiento en la nube que permite crear y administrar aplicaciones web. Ofrece servicios de computación en la nube para empresas.

Características:

  • Permite elegir entre varios proveedores de infraestructura en la nube.

  • Ofrece hosting gestionado de WordPress y WooCommerce.

  • Cuenta con un panel de control.

  • Ofrece soporte técnico 24/7.

  • Realiza copias de seguridad gestionadas.

  • Cuenta con seguridad gestionada.

  • Ofrece escalabilidad de rendimiento.

  • Cuenta con almacenamiento en caché avanzado.

  • Ofrece protección contra malware.


Beneficios:


  • Permite a los desarrolladores y negocios concentrarse en sus aplicaciones y sitios web.

  • Elimina la necesidad de conocimientos técnicos avanzados.

  • Permite implementar populares aplicaciones basadas en PHP en el alojamiento de infraestructura.

  • Ofrece una experiencia de hosting gestionado optimizada.

  • Permite migrar sitios web sin interrupciones ni complicaciones.


¿QUÉ ES WORDPRESS?


WordPress es un software gratuito o herramienta de gestión de contenidos, también llamado CMS (Content Management System), diseñada para crear y mantener fácilmente un Blog, un sitio Web o una Tienda Online.


WordPress es sin duda alguna, el mejor gestor de contenidos del mundo, y el más utilizado con diferencia, llegando actualmente a superar el 58% de cuota de mercado. Además es de código abierto y completamente gratuito.


Nuestro curso es 100% práctico, lo guiaremos a través de diversos pasos y juntos crearemos su tienda online con WordPress y Cloudways, de modo que al finalizar nuestro curso, tendrá su tienda online diseñada con su personalización y a su gusto.

¿QUÉ APRENDERÁS EN NUESTRO CURSO?

  • Cómo crear una cuenta gratis en Cloudways.

  • Cómo crear un servidor e instalar WordPress en Cloudways.

  • Cómo instalar una plantilla para tu tienda online.

  • Cómo configurar las opciones generales de WooCommerce para tu tienda online.

  • Cómo configurar las diferentes opciones de WooCommerce para tu tienda online.

  • Cómo apuntar un dominio a tu servidor de Cloudways.

  • Cómo instalar un certificado SSL para tu tienda online.



¿POR QUÉ ACCEDER A NUESTRO CURSO?


Nuestro curso de "Cómo Crear una Tienda Online con WordPress y Cloudways", es impartido por el experto y consultor de marketing digital: "Renato Yacolca",  creador de uno de los canales de YouTube más populares del mundo en los temas de tutoriales y marketing digital: Programación Fácil, SEO y Marketing, con más de 189,000 estudiantes (Botón de Plata de YouTube).


¡ACCEDE AHORA AL CURSO!


Inscríbase ahora y empiece con su aprendizaje en nuestro curso. Hay herramientas interesantes, atractivas y nuevas que aprender con WordPress y Cloudways.

Si tiene alguna pregunta sobre el contenido del curso o algo relacionado con este tema, siempre puede publicar una pregunta en el curso o enviarme un mensaje directo.

¡Adelante, haz clic en el botón de COMPRAR AHORA y te veré en la lección 1!

Saludos,

Renato Yacolca
